description: My personal website where you'll find all my recent projects and, also, a little bit of who I am

hero.description: Fullstack Developer focused on improvement for web perfomance and pleasant UI interfaces for the users

portfolio.title: My Recent Projects
portfolio.description: These are project I make as a hobby, using different tools like Astro.js, React.js and many more, combining them, and experimenting new stuff.

about.title: About me
about.first-paragraph: My name is Elías Pereyra Gómez. The enthusiasm for the world of the web started in 2015, when I met for the first time the markup languages: HTML and CSS. Later, I was getting deeper into the programming languages, like PHP, Java and JavaScript.
about.second-paragraph: In web development there are many areas, and of the many, fullstack development and UI design fascinate me.
about.subheader: These are the areas that I like to learn:
about.final_words: I like to be curious and learn other tools, how they work, what they do, what benefits and results they provide.

contact.title: Would you like to work with me?
contact.comment: I'd like to hear your proposals and make an incredible work together
contact.name: Name

expense_tracker.desc: An app designed for tracking different types of transactions: incomes and expenses. The project is built with React.js, using the Speechly AI library.
